overview: Stylized drama sequences, in combination with Monthy Python inspired cut out animations, illustrate key aspects of Schumpeterâ€™s life and theory.Successful entrepreneurs such as Simon Woodroffe (Yo!Sushi), Eric Wahlforss (Soundcloud), Stefan Smalle (Westwing) and Renaud Visage (Eventbrite) share the secrets of their success and offer insights into what it takes to be the innovative entrepreneur who Schumpeter identified as the key actor in the capitalist drama.
title: The Man Who Discovered Capitalism
